story: A dense forest stretches as far as the eye can see, with towering trees blocking out most of the midday sun. Vivid green leaves rustle gently in the breeze, and the smell of damp earth fills the air. Sounds of birds chirping and the occasional rustle of small animals create a natural symphony. To the left, a narrow path winds deeper into the woods, while straight ahead, a small clearing can be seen. To the right, the faint outline of a scenic trail appears, promising a view of the distant mountains.
scene_description: A forest flooded with vivid green leaves and the sounds of chirping birds. Tall trees create a canopy, casting dappled shadows on the forest floor. To the left, a narrow path winds into the deeper woods. Straight ahead, a small sunlit clearing breaks the monotony. To the right, a scenic trail leads towards the distant, majestic mountains. The air is fresh, filled with the scents of pine and damp earth.

directions.transition_text: The path narrows as the trees grow denser.
Sunlight streams into the small clearing ahead.
The scenic trail offers a promising view of the mountains.
